effects.display_string: Set: Shield of the Righteous deals 10% increased damage and grants 3% damage reduction.

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
(4) Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 331 Strength up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 51,014 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 115,947.
Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call an earthen ally to your aid, supporting you in combat.
